settings.heading: Crafty Crow Lehenga Studio
settings.subheading: Modern, minimal lehengas for every girl at the wedding—bridesmaids, sisters and the main character.

settings.heading: Designed to twirl, stitched to stay
settings.body: We build lehengas that feel as good as they look—soft linings, thoughtful cancan, and silhouettes that move with you on the dance floor. All in a clean black-and-white inspired design language that keeps the focus on you.

settings.heading: Why girls love Crafty Crow lehengas
